title: Resume Job Recommender
description: Semantic Resume Matching powered by AI Embeddings. Instantly finds relevant job opportunities from a curated dataset using Hugging Face transformers and Vector Similarity Search.

title: MediaSage
description: A high-performance semantic search engine built without a heavy backend database. Features client-side vector search and intelligent content analysis.

title: USB Access Control
description: Comprehensive security solution for managing USB access via hardware fingerprinting. Features real-time Android notifications and system-wide lockdown protocols.

title: Fish Disease AI
description: Deep learning model using Transfer Learning (ResNet50) to classify freshwater fish diseases with high accuracy. Trained on a curated dataset from South Asian aquaculture.

title: Phishing Detection
description: Comprehensive machine learning pipeline to classify phishing URLs. Utilizes ensemble methods (StackingClassifier), LIME interpretability, and advanced feature selection.
